title: 求解决
author: mcmyu_s
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!
Time: 15-8-15 下午1:44
Description: Exception in server tick loop
Missing Mods:
 Mantle : [1.7.10-0.3.2,)
cpw.mods.fml.common.MissingModsException
 at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.sortModList(Loader.java:243)

 at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onServerStart(FMLCommonHandler.java:319)
 at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:176)
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:631)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- System Details --
Details:
 Minecraft Version: 1.7.10
 KCauldron Version: pw.prok:KCauldron:1.7.10-1481.148
 Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
 Java Version: 1.7.0_67, Oracle Corporation

 JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1G
 AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
 IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
 FML: MCP v9.05 FML v7.10.99.99 Minecraft Forge 10.13.4.1481 11 mods loaded, 11 mods active
 States: 'U' = Unloaded 'L' = Loaded 'C' = Constructed 'H' = Pre-initialized 'I' = Initialized 'J' = Post-initialized 'A' = Available 'D' = Disabled 'E' = Errored
 U mcp{9.05} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) 
 U FML{7.10.99.99} [Forge Mod Loader] (KCauldron-1.7.10-1481.148-server.jar) 
 U Forge{10.13.4.1481} [Minecraft Forge] (KCauldron-1.7.10-1481.148-server.jar) 
 U kimagine{0.1} [KImagine] (minecraft.jar) 
 U PlayerAPI{1.0} [Player API] (minecraft.jar) 
 U inventorytweaks{1.59-dev-152-cf6e263} [Inventory Tweaks] ([物品整理]InventoryTweaks-1.59-dev-152.jar) 
 U TConstruct{1.7.10-1.8.2.build858} [Tinkers' Construct] (mckuai1.7.10TConstruct1.8.2amod.jar) 
 U Thaumcraft{4.2.2.1} [Thaumcraft] (mckuai1.7.10Thaumcraft4-2.2.1mod.jar) 
 U thaumcraftneiplugin{1.7.10-1.7} [Thaumcraft NEI Plugin] (mckuai1.7.10thaumcraftneiplugin1.7mod.jar) 
 U TwilightForest{2.2.3} [The Twilight Forest] (youxigt_mc1.7.10msslMOD.jar) 
 U Baubles{1.0.1.10} [Baubles] (Baubles-1.7.10-1.0.1.10.jar) 
 Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

 Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)
我只是想开个匠魂和神秘的mod服和基友玩怎么就出现这个了，求解决

replies.author: sanityko
replies.txt_content:
显示缺少一个叫mantle的mod…
不过你还把inventorytweaks这种单机mod装到了服务端

不过我并没有听过mantle这个前置mod，还是慢慢删mod来确定是哪个mod需要mantle吧…

replies.author: mcmyu_s
replies.txt_content:
sanityko 发表于 2015-8-15 14:01
显示缺少一个叫mantle的mod…
不过你还把inventorytweaks这种单机mod装到了服务端
谢谢大神我解决了mantle原来是地幔mod，匠魂需要支配他才能用
